attributes.action: Scrap plans to repaint the Prime Ministerial plane costing taxpayers £900,000
attributes.additional_details: Utilise the money planned on painting the Prime Ministerial money to further support those most vulnerable during the current pandemic.
attributes.background: The Prime Ministerial plan is due a 'pre-planned' paint job at the cost of £900,000 to tax payers. This money can easily be utilised elsewhere by providing school lunches, help to homeless during the continued pandemic, improvement of living conditions for asylum seekers. Stop this nonsense now.

rejection.details:
By the time your petition was started, the plane had already been painted. It's not clear what action can be taken now.

We understand that you're also concerned about homelessness and asylum seekers. You might like to sign and share these petitions instead: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300029
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/311322
